## Find source and headers
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE HEADERS *.h)
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SOURCES *.c*)

IF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)
  LIST(SORT HEADERS)
  LIST(SORT SOURCES)
ENDIF(CMAKE_HAS_SORT)

## Build
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
  ${NPK_INCLUDE_DIR}
  ${ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR}
)

ADD_LIBRARY(npk STATIC ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(npk ${ZLIB_LIBRARIES})
